name: grass production, organic, intensive | grass, organic | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/234/documentation

This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of grass (dry matter). The dry matter yield is 11500 kg/ha. Moisture content at harvest is 85%.;;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

This activity assumes grass production on a temporary meadow during three years (2-3 years in regions with high arable use, 3-4 years in regions with low arable use) and represents an average of the three years; it starts with the soil cultivation and sowing after the harvest of the previous crop. The input of seeds is considered. Farm manure as an organic fertiliser is only accounted for in terms of direct field emissions; all pre-processes are included in the animal production systems.


The dataset includes all machine operations and corresponding machine infrastructure and sheds. Machine operations are: soil cultivation, sowing, fertilisation, mowing and loading for transport. This activity ends after loading of the grass at the farm gate.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/011:Growing of non-perennial crops/0119:Growing of other non-perennial crops

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Refers to a production in the Swiss plateau (lowlands <700m).
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data were compiled from statistics, fertilising recommendations, documents from extension services and expert knowledge.

exchanges.description: Net yield of 11'500 kg DM/(ha*year) (experts assumption R. Tschachtli, LBBZ, 2005).

flow.name: grass, organic
flow.category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/011:Growing of non-perennial crops/0119:Growing of other non-perennial crops

exchanges.description: Formula as in ecoinvent report No. 15, chapter 4.4 (Nemecek et al. 2004)

4-6 harvests (LBL 2004), 5 harvests assumed
This exchange has an activity link directly to the producing activity because the product is primarily consumed in the same geographical area where it is produced.
